welcome_message: Welcome to our dashboard. Manage your account and your subscriptions.
personal_info_desc: See your profile data and manage your Account to choose what is saved in our system.
security_settings_desc: You have full control to manage your own account and keep account fully secure.
billing_history_desc: Check out all your payment history. You can also download or print your invoice.
account_reports_desc: Check your reports of uses and manage your packages or subscriptions that you have.
help_desc: Ask a question or file a support ticket, manage request, report an issues. Our support team will get back to you by email.
